pullrequest.title: added base_footprint, tighter amcl config, and better rviz config

content.raw:
I merged default into this branch and changed `config.yaml` so all target locations are in open areas, and also copied the resulting initial pose to `amcl_diff.launch` (branch `wjwwood_nav_tuning_louise`).

Even though it started with a map perfectly matching the sensor readings, the robot wasn't able to trace a path from the private cafe (the open one) to the front entrance. Then I started giving it intermediate goals and it progressed with a lot of difficulty, often bumping into walls.

What would be the one thing to focus on to improve this? Is it mainly an odometry problem because the wheel is slipping?
